name: Zodiac Links
description:
INSTRUCTION
- Find the pairs of the same icon and connect them before out of time (or live).

- The Path between two icons must have maximum of three lines

FEATURE

- Have 40 levels from easy to hard for your conquest (amatuer to master)
- Three hints all way there for you like a friend.
- Compare highscore with the others via HighScore feature.

Enjoy your time!!!
